price: 如果你问他们：“谁创造了天地？”他们必定说：“万能的、全知的主创造了天地。”
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
